title: Yuin

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At the beginning of the game, pick a hero sided role that is legal to spawn. If the host does not rule 17 said role, you gain all their abilities and attributes, and will appear to be that role until the Latex has voting majority.

fields.name: Attribute:
fields.value:
- If someone attempts to attack you, you will die, but they will become this role, regardless of their willpower, role conversion legality, and conversion immunity. However, they will retain their original abilities and attributes.
- If your role would normally commit suicide over killing a townie, you won't.
- You cannot negatively target other latexes.

desc:
Post 2894
*"These things like to camouflage themselves. Wonder how that wo- oh [EXPLICIT], OH [EXPLICIT]!" -Dr.████████, MIT, moments before he "went missing".*
